author: James Crump, James Crump
title: Coronavirus: LA mayor awkwardly tries on face mask as he urges everyone in California to wear them at home
description: 'We're going to have to get used to seeing each other like this'
content:
LA mayor Eric Garcetti awkwardly tried on a face mask while advising everyone in California to wear one, amid the coronavirus pandemic.
In a press conference on Wednesday evening, Mr Garcetti told residents of the state to wear face masks, but said they shou… [+1787 chars]
